thread.title: Lightning D Nikita Nesterov suspended 2 games for boarding

title: Lightning D Nikita Nesterov suspended 2 games for boarding
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Sports - Today 
Tampa Bay Lightning defenseman Nikita Nesterov has been suspended for two games without pay for boarding Dallas Stars forward Curtis McKenzi...
